title: Joshua Darden
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034243/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034243/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Joshua Darden**

Chief designer of [Darden Studio](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034243/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/), based in Brooklyn, NY. Previously worked with [Jonathan Hoefler](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034243/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jonathan%20Hoefler) at Hoefler & Frere-Jones and started his own foundry in 2004.

_Typefaces:_  
Freight Big  
Freight Display  
Freight Text  
Freight Micro  
Freight Sans  
Jubilat  
Birra  
Omnes  
Omnes Pro  
Corundum Text

Site: [http://www.dardenstudio.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130116034243/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/ "http://www.dardenstudio.com/")
author: Miss Tiffany
